status.name: Closed

fields.description:
Tapping on the XML data table row does not give us any screen with XML data on it.

Not a Regression, occurs with 2.0.2GA

Steps to reproduce:
1.Build kitchen sink for mobile web in titanium studio.
2.Type the ip address of your laptop into the mobile device's web browser.(safari for iphone & IE for windows phone). 
3.Hit go or enter.
4.Kitchen sink will fire up in the browser.
5.Tap on platform tab.
6.Tap on the XHR table row.
7.Tap on the XML data table row.
8.Notice that we do not get any page or screen with XML data on it.

Actual result:
1.We do not get any screen or page with XML data on it on tapping the XML data table row.

Expected result:
1.Tapping on the XML data table row gives us a screen with XML data on it.
fields.summary: MobileWeb: Platform-->XHR-->XML data:Tapping on the XML data table row does not give us any screen with XML data on it.
fields.environment:
Titanium Studio : 2.1.0.201206062004
SDK Version : 2.1.0.v20120607000247
Iphone 4.3.5
Windows phone mango
